Are you a beginner or hobbyist, and you want to start your welding career? Undoubtedly, You might be looking for the best Mig Welder under 300$. In my opinion, it would be a great choice if you start practicing on cheap Welders at the beginning. 

There are different Mig Welder brands available in the market but, f; for beginners, it is very compelling to choose under 300$ Mig Welder that is capable of perfectly on metal plates of thickness up to 3/16″. 

Don’t worry anymore; We’ve picked up a list of top 5 Mig Welders under 300$ that is capable of welding on thick and thin steel metals. Let’s dive right in!

Top 5 Best Mig Welders Under 300$ Reviews

It’s complicated for a beginner to find a quality Mig Welder under 300$ who can weld perfectly. After doing extensive research on different Mig Welder brands (Lincoln, Forney, Vivohome, Sungoldpower), we’ve compiled a list of the top 5 Best quality Mig Welders under 300$. 

Our compiled list of budget Mig Welders under 300$ is easy to use for beginners. Hopefully, Our provided information on these Mig welders will be enough for you to make a final decision.

If you need more quality premium welders with high price then you can check out our best Mig Welding Machine Under 1000$.

Best Overall

1. Lincoln Electric K2278-1

Specifications:

  • Dimension: 8.82 x 17.99 x 12.8 inches
  • Input voltage: 115v
  • Duty Cycle: 20% at 90amps
  • Weight: 45 pounds
  • Output Amps: 70amps
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Lincoln Electric K2278-1 is a great handy core Mig Welder under 300$ that can work perfectly well, especially for home repair and hobby projects.

Practicing on this welder could help you a lot on how to handle professional welding. Moreover, it is straightforward to set up and use this machine, especially for novice welders. 

The best part is, this machine can also work great on low power input as it is capable of plugin into 115v household current at 20amp outlet. 

Another excellent safety feature of this machine is a cold contractor. This safety contractor keeps your welding machine electrically cold. It keeps the welding wires cold as long as the gun trigger is pressed. It has the ability to weld on 18 gauge to ⅛” mild steel.

Now let’s talk about the control panel of this machine. It is straightforward to set up and maintain the control panel of this machine for beginners. The accessories that come with this machine are also easy to set up and takes minimum time to assemble. 

This machine’s output power is 35-88 amps, whereas it takes the low input power. 

If you want to work on small projects and home repairing projects, this under 300$ mig welding machine has enough duty cycle to work well on these projects. The Duty cycle of this machine is 20 percent at 90 amps. 

Apart from this, the great thing about this machine comes with all the accessories that you need to start. The package includes a welding gun, cable assembly, work lead, work clamp and input power cable, flux-cored wire electrode, welding hand shield, and chipping hammer/brush.

Moreover, if you are a beginner or limited on a budget, this is the best mig welding machine under 300$. You can use it for your home, repairing, hobbyist, and small projects. 

Pros
  • Portable, lightweight & easy to use
  • Great welder for beginners
  • Welder feeds works great for building fence
  • Comes with all accessories that you need to start welding fastly
  • Cold Contractor feature keeps welding wires cold
  • Great unit for light material
  • Comes with 12 months of warranty
Cons
  • Takes too much time to cool down
Check Price on Amazon
Premium Choice

2. Super Deal PRO Commercial MIG 130

Specifications:

  • Dimension: 20.2 x 15 x 12.5 in
  • Weight: 38.1 lbs
  • Cord with welding gun: 2.5M
  • Input frequency: 60 Hz
  • Input voltage: 110 V
  • Output current range: 50-120 A
  • Circuit breaker: 30A
  • Duty cycle: 10% at 105AMP, 35% at 60 AMP
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Super Deal PRO Commercial MIG 130 is one of the great household Mig welders under 300$ in the welder market. The weight of this welder is very light, and also it comes with powerful qualities and features. 

This machine is made with superior PVC materials. In addition to PVC, it is used for manufacturing purposes because it is very powerful and weather resistant. It is also capable of providing a strong joint and seal.

Another excellent feature of this machine is it is very easy to operate and provides high-quality precision. Moreover, it has the ability to integrate comfort grip. 

The best part is that you can easily use it because of its user-friendly interface, even if you are a beginner. Moreover, this machine has the ability to perform flawlessly in most prolonged or heavy-duty jobs. 

Apart from this, this commercial welder performs more than your expectations, especially in commercial quality welding projects. Also, it has the ability to weld on mild steel and stainless steel. It can also perform on thin materials like sheet metals.

The weight of this machine is only 38lbs, which is very light. Because it is a lightweight and portable machine, you can use it for your shop, home, or field projects and expect high-quality Performance.

Another excellent addition to this machine is waveform technology, which can weld power sources, which can affect heat input. Waveform technology can perfectly manage the welding output with the use of multi process control. 

With this technology, it also used an adjustable inductor. With the help of this adjustable inductor, you can adjust the welding inductance according to welding needs and requirements. If you want to increase or decrease arc time or frequency short-circuiting, you can do this by adjusting the welding inductance. 

Moreover, this machine has variable feed speed control, which can adjust the current flow of the machine. With the help of this wire-speed feature, you can weld on steel with different thicknesses.

This machine is a very compact, powerful, and robust portable unit that can perform even on most extended and heavy-duty projects.

If you have a limited budget and looking for a welder who can work on home, DIY, and even general repairing work, this is the best MIG welder under 300$.

Pros
  • Easy to operate
  • Easy to use for beginners
  • Made with PVC material
  • Provide high quality precision
  • Greate machine for home, DIY, and Repairing work projects
  • Perfectly weld on steel with different thicknesses
  • Great portable unit than other welders
Cons
  • Wire feed isn’t very smooth
Check Price on Amazon
Starter Welder

3. Forney Easy Weld 299 125FC

Specifications:

  • Dimension: 12 x 18 x 24 inches
  • Amperage Capacity: 125amps
  • Power cord: 15amp cord
  • Cord length: 6ft
  • Weight: 41.9 pounds
  • Input voltage: 120v
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Forney Easy Weld 299 125FC is a flux core Mig welder under 300$ that works great if you want to create metal art or to build a fire pit for your backyard. It also has the capability to perfectly weld broken lawnmower, cracked garden utensils, or other different easy welding projects. 

However, some people knew it as a Mig welding machine, but the fact is you can’t add gas to this machine. As compared to other Mig welding machines, this machine doesn’t require a shielding gas. 

This machine is a perfect choice for beginners, do it yourself welders, or home repairing projects. This welding machine is excellent for those starter welders who want to practice welding machines. Apart from this, Forney Welders are always famous and most rated among experience welders.

This machine has the capability to weld on 24 gauge up to ¼ in thick metals. It operates on 120v input and gives maximum 125amp output. Moreover, it also accepts 2 and 10 wire spool gun and has the capability to weld ⅛” thick steel metals.

Another excellent feature of this machine is it offers ample space, which has the ability to check wire rolls are stable or not during welding. This machine’s duty cycle is 20% at 125 amps, which is enough to perfectly weld on steel, iron, and stainless steel. 

With its different feed rates and metal handle, this machine enables you to customize the arc according to your needs and requirements. The packages include with this machine are a ground clamp and a Mig gun. 

In our opinion, it is the best MIG welder under 300$ for beginners, hobbyists, and home welders. It also comes with a 6-month warranty. You can also check our related Cheap Mig Welder Reviews.

Pros
  • Easy to use for starter and hobbyist
  • Weld on 24 gauge up to ¼ in thick metals
  • Comes with ample space feature to make sure wire rolls are stable
  • Best for light to medium welding jobs
  • Reliable during use
  • Clean and consistent
  • Ability to bend ⅛” thick steel without weld breaking
  • Welds both 0.030 and 0.035 wires without any problem
Cons
  • Not suitable for massive duty projects
Check Price on Amazon
Portable Flux Core

4. VIVOHOME Portable Flux Core

Specifications:

  • Dimension: 20.47 x 15.2 x 12.44 inches
  • Weight: 37.2 pounds
  • Voltage: 110V
  • Frequency: 50-60Hz
  • Current Range: 50-120A
  • Max Current Output: 105@15%
  • Material: Stainless steel
Check On Amazon

Overview:

If you are a beginner and looking for a welder for home repairs and hobby projects, then VIVOHOME Portable Flux Core welder is the best MIG welder under 300$. It is designed with high-quality types of materials like stainless steel. 

It has the capability to work on hobby projects on light gauge steel. You can use it for small and professional welding projects. It also has the ability to weld on mild steel and stainless steel. 

The pretty useful feature of this under 300$ Mig welder is it prevents the oxidation of welding parts. Moreover, it also has the capability to work on auto bodywork and weld on thin materials also perfectly. 

The design of this machine is sturdy and compact. Because it’s a lightweight and portable machine so you can carry it from one place to another. The comfortable hand grip is also a useful feature of this flux core welding machine. 

This machine is very versatile because it can work great on mild steel and aluminum welding projects. If you want to work on thin sheet metals, then VIVOHOME Portable Flux Core would be the best choice for you. 

The fantastic feature of this machine is it can weld like a professional welder. Even though it is a cheap welder, you can expect a professional finish in welding from this machine, especially in auto body welding work and thin steel welding projects.

Another excellent addition to this machine is it is capable of adjusting welding speed. This machine has the ability to adjust the speed at ten levels so that you can adjust it according to your welding needs. 

It is very easy to tackle thicker or thin steel and aluminum sheet metal with flux core welding. This machine’s flux core wire releases MIG gas while welding, which makes it very easy to prevent oxidation. 

The best part is, this machine is heat resistant, so you will not face-melting problems during your welding work. 

However, if you are looking for a welder who can work perfectly on thin or thicker sheet metals, then VIVOHOME Portable Flux Core is the best Mig Welder under 300$. It has many other great features and comes at a low price. You can take every type of hobby and home welding projects from this cheap price welder. 

Due to its outstanding quality and low price, we’ve picked it up in our list of best Mig welders under 300$.

  • Best for home repairing and hobby projects
  • Ability to prevent oxidation on welding parts

Budget Welder

5. SUNGOLDPOWER MIG Welder 140A

Specifications:

  • Voltage: AC110V/220V±10%,50/60Hz
  • Max input current(A): 110V:120A,220V:140A
  • Rated output(A/V): 110V:120A/20V,220V:140A/21V
  • Welding current range(A): 110V:50-120,220V:50-140
  • No-load voltage: 55V
  • Rated load duty cycle: 60%
  • Efficiency(%): 85%
  • Product weight: 22.8lb
Check On Amazon

Overview:

SUNGOLDPOWER MIG Welder 140A is a multifunctioning 220v Mig Welder under 300$ which is designed with DC IGBT Inverter technology. It is capable of welding with both gasless flux-cored welding and gas shielded Mig Welding. 

This machine also has the ability to adjust voltage and wire feed speed easily. With the adjustment, it will give excellent welding results.

Great feature of this under 300$ Mig Welding machine is it has a broad current range even you can work with it at 220v if needed. This massive power will help you to work on large projects. 

The best part is that this machine’s duty cycle is 60%, which means after 6 minutes of work, it needs to sit only for four, which is very quick. In contrast, most of the welders come with 20% of the duty cycle. 

It works on dual voltage 110/220v and also a heat-resistant machine that protects the machine from overheating. This machine is more suitable for 2lb and 10lb wire spool.

If you want to weld on stainless steel, mild steel, iron, carbon steel, and other different materials, this machine would be a perfect choice. It has the ability to weld multiple types of metal materials. It is one of the perfect machines that weld on stainless steel nicely.

Moreover, if you are a beginner, you can easily use and operate this machine. The Packages included with this machine are Mig Torch, cable with earth clamp, flux core wire, mask, and brush.

We’ve picked it up on our list because it is one of the best Mig machines under 300$, which can weld on different metal materials. If you want to weld on different metal materials, then it is the best MIG welder under 300$ for you.  

Pros
  • Consistent Performance on 110v/220v
  • Portable unit
  • Overheating protection capability
  • 2lb and 10lb wire spool
  • Easily use and operate
  • Perfectly weld on stainless steel
Cons
  • Not enough Amp current

FAQ’s

Lincoln Electric K2278-1 and Super Deal PRO Commercial MIG 130 are the best Mig Welders under 300$. Because these are great welders for beginners, they have the ability to work on small or light welding projects perfectly. Even if you want to practice welding, these easy to use Mig Welders could be the best choice for you. 

However, we’ve picked 5 lists of Mig welders; it depends on your welding needs which one is best suited for you. All of these under 300$ Mig Welders are Great and most rated among welder professionals.

It depends on your welding needs; if you are a beginner and want to practice welding, you should choose Mig Welders under the 300$ or 500$ price range. But if you are a professional and looking for a welder who has the ability to weld on massive projects, then you should choose professional welders. However, our guide on Mig Welders would help you choose the best professional Mig Welders for heavy welding jobs.

Conclusion

While buying the best MIG welder under 300$ or any price range, you should be careful. As you are a beginner, prefer to choose top brand Mig welding products. Look at the specifications and features of the product. It depends on your welding needs, which Mig welder under 300$ you are going to buy. 

However, We believe our top 5 best budget Mig welder under 300$ guide helped you choose the best quality Mig Welder Under 300$. Our Picked Welders are best for budget welders, beginners, and all types of light and small welding projects.
